archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Mediate Party Interactions
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manages conversion of externally received messages into the required internal enterprise formats, and manages conversion to agreed externally send message formats.

properties.value: The purpose of the Mediate Party Interactions is to ensure that transaction message structure and interactions conform to agreed or externally defined or agreed standards used by the enterprise and its Parties. Increasingly transactions with external parties (e.g. Parties using RosettaNet or Web Services standards) will need to conform to message and data formats defined by third parties or third party organizations.
